meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fashionable or stylish.
meanings.sent1: Her modishness was evident in the way she effortlessly combined different patterns and colors.
meanings.sent2: The modishness of her outfit caught the attention of everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: Despite her attempts to hide her modishness, her friends always knew she had a keen eye for fashion.
meanings.sent4: Her modishness was like a beacon in a sea of ordinary attire, drawing admiration from all around.
meanings.sent5: The modishness of her wardrobe was so striking that it inspired others to update their own style.

meanings.definition: The act of following or setting current trends in fashion.
meanings.sent1: She embraced modishness by always being the first to try out new fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: In the world of fashion, modishness is key to staying relevant and exciting.
meanings.sent3: Her dedication to modishness sometimes led her to wear outfits that raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: Modishness in fashion is like a dance between tradition and innovation, constantly evolving.
meanings.sent5: The modishness of her designs set a new standard for creativity in the fashion industry.
